meanings.definition: A plant of the caper family, with divided leaves and spikes of showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cleome in the garden has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a cleome in my backyard for its colorful blooms.
meanings.sent3: The cleome decided to wear its most vibrant flowers to the garden party.
meanings.sent4: The cleome stood tall like a colorful beacon in the sea of greenery.
meanings.sent5: The cleome's showy flowers attracted butterflies and bees alike.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Cleome.
meanings.sent1: I saw a unique cleome at the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: The cleome plant in the park caught my attention with its unusual leaves.
meanings.sent3: The cleome plant whispered secrets to the other flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The cleome's presence in the room was as striking as a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The cleome's distinct appearance made it easy to spot among the other plants.
